Zubaidah Isaacs

Aspiring Developer.

About

My name is Zubaidah Isaacs and I am an Aspiring Developer. I enjoy my work and am currently studying at a coding.

In my free time I enjoy cycling and baking. My favourite type of movies would be detective fiction because I am curious, enjoy a challenge and like solving mysteries.

In 2020

I completed matric this year with a diploma pass.

I was valedictorian of my class. For 4 onths after that I was at home and occupied myself by baking and selling what I made.

In 2021-2022

I volunteered as a tutor for english and mathematics at a primary school in Heideveld.

The duration of my voluntary act was for 8 months and then I applied for a learnership.

In 2022-2023

In the last qauter of 2022 I started a learnership of NQFL4 in Nature Conservation for 12 months.

After I completed the learnership I then started at the coding academy at Life Choices.

Soft & Technical Skills

Communication

I find it easy to converse with people on both casual and professional levels.

Problem Solving

I tend to find solutions quickly and often would find the most suitable one.

Emotional Intelligence

I can control my emotions well and I don't act based on my emotions.
